original_text: Because we have become God's children, we can live in a good way. We can refuse to live like people who belong to this world. We are able to win against the wrong ways of this world because we trust Jesus Christ.
korean_text: 무릇 하나님께로부터 난 자마다 세상을 이기느니라 세상을 이기는 승리는 이것이니 우리의 믿음이니라

sentences.original_text: Because we have become God's children
we can live in a good way
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 선한 방식으로 살 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: We can refuse to live like people
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 사람들처럼 사는 것을 거부할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: We are able to win against the wrong ways
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 잘못된 방식들에 대해 이길 수 있습니다
